title: Riot Points problems
body: Today i bought $100 dollars of rp, but i didn't receive rp at all.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This definitely sounds like a big problem, were you charged? Have you tried restarting your client since the purchase as this usually helps.

If the RP still isn't showing up and you're sure you were charged you're going to have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to player support as they're the only ones who can help with account related issues.
